title: The faithful shepherdess Relating how a young maid by her constant love, turned the heart of a faithful lover: who seeing the truth of her affections, after a tedious absence, came and married her, and liv'd very happily with her. To a very new tune: or, Farewel fair Armeda: or, Captain Digby's Farewel.
publicationStmtPublisher: printed for Phillip Brooksby, next door to the ball in West-smithfield,
